tool_description: Use Google Translate API, Same quality result but x100 cheaper. Fast and stable translation service
name: Google Translate
title: Google Translate

api_list.name: Tranlate Text

utterances.utterance: Translate 'Hello, how are you?' from English to Spanish.
Can you translate 'Bonjour' from French to English?
Translate 'Guten Tag' from German to Chinese.

Translate 'Merci' from French to German.

api_list.name: Detect Language

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: 感谢您使用我们的服务"

utterances.utterance: What language is this text in: 'Gracias por usar nuestro servicio'?
Can you detect the language of this phrase: 'Merci d'utiliser notre service'?
Identify the language of this sentence: 'Danke, dass Sie unseren Service nutzen'.

parameters.text: Danke, dass Sie unseren Service nutzen

utterances.utterance: What language is this: 'Grazie per aver usato il nostro servizio'?

parameters.text: Grazie per aver usato il nostro servizio

utterances.utterance: Detect the language of this text: 'Obrigado por usar nosso serviço'.
Can you tell me the language of this phrase: 'Спасибо за использование нашего сервиса'?
What language is this text in: 'ありがとうございました。私たちのサービスをご利用いただき'?

parameters.text: ありがとうございました。私たちのサービスをご利用いただき

utterances.utterance: Detect the language of this sentence: 'شكرا لاستخدامك خدمتنا'.
What language is this: 'Tack för att du använder vår tjänst'?

parameters.text: Tack för att du använder vår tjänst

utterances.utterance: Can you identify the language of this text: 'Dziękujemy za skorzystanie z naszej usługi'?

parameters.text: Dziękujemy za skorzystanie z naszej usługi

api_list.name: Translate JSON

parameters.name: json
parameters.default: { 		"title": "The Importance of Regular Exercise", 		"author": "John Doe", 		"rate": 4.2999, 		"extra": { 			"comment_counts": 10, 			"last_comment": { 				"author": "not be translated", 				"short_text": "Hi thank for your post... We need more information" 			} 		} 	}
